description:
Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of security software, configurations, defensive tools, and sensors that are installed on a system or in a cloud environment.
This may include things such as firewall rules and anti-viru
 Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Security Software Discovery by Powershell
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:*get\-process* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.Description* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-like* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*\"*virus*\"* OR *\"*carbonblack*\"* OR *\"*defender*\"* OR *\"*cylance*\"*))
